name: PowerBI
description: Microsoft Power BI connector for enterprise data management and reporting. Enables programmatic control over Power BI workspaces, datasets, and reports. Features include real-time data streaming via Push Datasets, PBIX file imports, workspace management, and automated dataset refreshes. Ideal for organizations looking to automate their Power BI operations and integrate Power BI into their data workflows.

connectionDefinitions.name: Microsoft Entra ID OAuth2
connectionDefinitions.description: OAuth 2.0 client credentials flow for service-to-service authentication with Power BI

attributes.title: Tenant ID
attributes.description: The directory tenant ID or domain name (e.g. contoso.onmicrosoft.com)

attributes.title: Client ID
attributes.description: The application (client) ID from Microsoft Entra admin center

attributes.title: Client Secret
attributes.description: The client secret generated in Microsoft Entra admin center

attributes.title: Scope
attributes.description: The Power BI API permission scope (e.g. https://analysis.windows.net/powerbi/api/.default)

attributes.title: Environment
attributes.description: The Power BI API environment to connect to

GroupConfig.description: Settings for caching detailed Power BI workspace data

GroupsConfig.title: Groups List Cache Configuration
GroupsConfig.description: Settings for caching basic Power BI workspace list data

configSchema.description: Configuration for Power BI workspace data caching

dataObjects.name: Group
dataObjects.description: A Power BI workspace (group) containing reports, dashboards, and datasets

isOnDedicatedCapacity.description: Whether the workspace is assigned to a dedicated capacity

defaultDatasetStorageFormat.description: The default dataset storage format in the workspace. Only returned when isOnDedicatedCapacity is true

dataflowStorageId.description: The Power BI dataflow storage account ID

id.description: An identifier for the resource within Power BI

resourceGroup.description: The resource group within the subscription where the resource resides

subscriptionId.description: The Azure subscription where the resource resides

logAnalyticsWorkspace.description: The Log Analytics workspace assigned to the group

schema.description: A Power BI workspace (group) containing reports, dashboards, and datasets

actions.name: Create
actions.description: Creates a new Power BI workspace

name.description: The name of the workspace to create

workspaceV2.description: Whether to create a V2 workspace. The only supported value is true.

id.description: The ID of the created workspace

name.description: The name of the created workspace

isOnDedicatedCapacity.description: Whether the workspace is on dedicated capacity

dataObjects.name: Groups
dataObjects.description: Represents a Power BI workspace (group) that a user has access to.

isOnDedicatedCapacity.description: Whether the group is assigned to a dedicated capacity

defaultDatasetStorageFormat.description: The default dataset storage format in the workspace. Only returned when isOnDedicatedCapacity is true

dataflowStorageId.description: The Power BI dataflow storage account ID

schema.description: Represents a Power BI workspace (group) that a user has access to.

modules.name: Datasets

UpdateDatasetConfig.description: Configuration for updating dataset properties (storage mode and query scale-out settings)

configSchema.title: Datasets V1 Action Processor Configuration
configSchema.description: Configuration for updating Power BI datasets

DatasetsConfig.description: Configuration for reading lists of datasets

configSchema.title: Datasets V1 Cache Writer Configuration
configSchema.description: Configuration for reading and caching Power BI datasets

dataObjects.name: Dataset
dataObjects.description: A Power BI dataset containing properties like name, owner, refresh settings, etc.

addRowsAPIEnabled.description: Whether the dataset allows adding new rows

isRefreshable.description: Whether the dataset can be refreshed. Returns true when the dataset is either recently refreshed or configured for automatic refresh with Import connection mode

isEffectiveIdentityRequired.description: Whether the dataset requires an effective identity for GenerateToken API calls

isEffectiveIdentityRolesRequired.description: Whether row-level security is defined requiring a role to be specified

isOnPremGatewayRequired.description: Whether the dataset requires an on-premises data gateway

createReportEmbedURL.description: The dataset create report embed URL

webUrl.description: The web URL of the dataset

isInPlaceSharingEnabled.description: Whether the dataset can be shared with external users to be consumed in their own tenant

schema.description: A Power BI dataset containing properties like name, owner, refresh settings, etc.

actions.name: Update
actions.description: Updates a Power BI dataset's properties like storage mode and query scale-out settings

groupId.description: Optional workspace/group ID. If not provided, updates dataset in My workspace

autoSyncReadOnlyReplicas.description: Whether the dataset automatically syncs read-only replicas

maxReadOnlyReplicas.description: Maximum number of read-only replicas for the dataset (0-64, -1 for automatic number of replicas)

queryScaleOutSettings.description: Query scale-out settings of a dataset

id.description: The dataset ID that was updated

dataObjects.name: Import
dataObjects.description: Represents a Power BI import object that contains information about imported items like reports and datasets.

updatedDateTime.description: Import last update date and time

items.description: The datasets associated with this import

datasets.description: The datasets associated with this import

items.description: The reports associated with this import

reports.description: The reports associated with this import

schema.description: Represents a Power BI import object that contains information about imported items like reports and datasets.

actions.name: Create
actions.description: Creates a new import in Power BI, either in My Workspace or a specified group

groupId.description: Optional. The workspace/group ID to import into. If not provided, imports into My Workspace

datasetDisplayName.description: The display name of the dataset, should include file extension

fileContent.description: The base64 encoded content of the file to import

nameConflict.description: Specifies what to do if a dataset with the same name exists

skipReport.description: Whether to skip report import. Only supported for Power BI .pbix files

overrideReportLabel.description: Whether to override existing report label when republishing

overrideModelLabel.description: Whether to override existing model label when republishing

updatedDateTime.description: Import last update date and time

dataObjects.name: Imports
dataObjects.description: Represents a Power BI import object in a collection

updatedDateTime.description: Import last update date and time

items.description: The datasets associated with this import

datasets.description: The datasets associated with this import

items.description: The reports associated with this import

reports.description: The reports associated with this import

schema.description: Represents a Power BI import object in a collection

dataObjects.name: Temp Upload Location
dataObjects.description: Represents a temporary blob storage upload location for importing large Power BI .pbix files

expirationTime.description: The expiration date and time of the shared access signature URL

url.description: The shared access signature URL for the temporary blob storage

schema.description: Represents a temporary blob storage upload location for importing large Power BI .pbix files

actions.name: Create Temp Upload Location
actions.description: Creates a temporary blob storage upload location for importing large Power BI .pbix files (1-10 GB)

groupId.description: Optional. The workspace ID. If not provided, creates upload location in My Workspace

expirationTime.description: The expiration date and time of the shared access signature URL

url.description: The shared access signature URL for the temporary blob storage

actions.description: Deletes all rows from a Power BI push dataset table
